name: Modern Air Combat: Beyond Visual Range
name_original: Modern Air Combat: Beyond Visual Range
description: Modern Air Combat: Beyond Visual Range is a solo developed 400 km x 400 km multiplayer game in which you can play as two of the most legendary aircraft of the 20th century. Fire long range missiles and fly through mountains in close aerial combat to fight in PvP with friends or against bots. MAC: BVR aims to be a middle ground between realist simulators and easy to learn arcade flying games. Fight using real life tactics while not needing to spend tens of hours to learn a single aircraft.
